subject: Cruelty to Animals
Colleges and Universities
Animals
Football
Mascots
Dogfighting
Cockfighting
lead_paragraph: The state of Louisiana is on the skirmish lines of a growing fight waged by animal-rights groups, lawmakers and courts over the treatment of animals in relation to sports.
snippet: The state of Louisiana is on the skirmish lines of a growing fight waged by animal-rights groups, lawmakers and courts over the treatment of animals in relation to sports.
